text: AMD collaborates with @Livermore_Lab to upgrade the @PenguinHPC-built Corona HPC Cluster with cutting-edge AMD Instinct accelerators. Learn how AMD technology will nearly double the peak performance of the Cluster to aid essential COVID-19 research.

AMD is proud to pledge $15 million in high-performance systems to our COVID-19 HPC Fund, providing research institutions with computing resources to accelerate essential medical research. Read more from @statesman.

“AMD remains focused on providing strong and unwavering support to our employees, customers, and the communities around the world we call home.” Read President and CEO @LisaSu’s message on AMD’s response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

AMD is dedicated to protecting our workforce, serving our customers, and supporting our global community. Read on to learn how AMD is closely monitoring the impact of COVID-19 and standing with you during this difficult time.
